If journalists following you step by step is difficult to have a private life.
On the other hand. I believe that Journalists doing their work, but sometimes they try to impress their boss and always. Following the Famous people in order to discover something new of their lifes.
Another thing is the pressure. From media owners and the difficulty For someone to Find job in our days.
